name: Pizzas Before Christmas
description:
A metroidvania game where you play as a monster hunter task to exterminate Cthulhu pizza monsters. 100% not inspired by Castlevania.

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Click to attack

E to interact

ESC to pause the game

Credits:

Titania font -> https://www.dafont.com/titania.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
